response.summary:
Professional in Chemical Engineering, MBA candidate, and Project Management specialist with work experience in Research (RDI), product development, project management and Quality Management Systems.

Goal-oriented, altruistic, dynamic, and organized, with excellent interpersonal skills, soft skills, uncertainty management, emotional intelligence, communication skills, initiative, and leadership. Academic background in Nanotechnology, Research and Innovation, Digital Teaching, Project Formulation, Key Performance Indicators, Process Safety in the Chemical Industry, occupational safety and health management system, Internal Auditor for ISO 22716 (Good Manufacturing Practices for Cosmetics) and ISO 9001.
response.skills: Pensamiento crítico, Estrategia, Gestión de cambio estructural, Estructura organizativa, ITAC SecureFile®, Nanotecnología, Docencia universitaria, Investigación, Pedagogía, Asuntos normativos, Buenas prácticas de fabricación, Aseguramiento de la calidad, Responsabilidad profesional, Formulación, Capacidad de análisis, Administración de la cadena de suministro, Aprovisionamiento, Ingeniería química, Química, Desarrollo empresarial

profile_positions.description: Formulation and Development of Research and Innovation Projects in Materials Nanotechnology for Centro de Manufactura en Textil y Cuero at SENA
profile_positions.title: Senior Researcher

profile_positions.description: Professor in Material Balance and Applied Industrial Chemistry in the Department of Chemical Engineering at Universidad ECCI
profile_positions.title: Professor

profile_positions.description: Management and Administration of the retail location, finances, logistics, and distribution. Formulation of the business project funded by government entities, marketing and advertising strategies. Team leader, training, and quality assurance, design of the management system.
profile_positions.title: Branch Manager

profile_positions.description:
ACHIEVEMENTS:

Design, Implementation, and Training of the Quality Management System under Andean Technical Regulation 2206 for Good Manufacturing Practices in Cosmetic Products of the Andean Community - INVIMA.
Favorable Audit Report for Coopidrogas in compliance with Resolution 3774 of 2004 on Good Cosmetic Manufacturing Practices.
Validation of Procedures and Batch Records.
Procedure for Equipment Measurement Verification in accordance with SIM Guide MWG7/cg-01/v.00.
Adherence to Schedules and Quality Program.
ACTIVITIES:

Review of production documents in accordance with INVIMA registration.
Handling visits from regulatory bodies.
Implementation of the Quality Management System (QMS).
Contracting with calibration, microbiology, pest control, and hazardous waste collection service providers.
Receipt and response to Product Quality Complaints (PQR).
Regulatory advisory services to the board of directors and clients.
Quality inspection.
Training of technical and administrative personnel in the QMS.
Internal audit with an improvement plan.
External audit with clients.
Certification in Good Manufacturing Practices (BPM).
profile_positions.title: Quality Assurance Director

profile_positions.description: Metrology of Control Parameters for Raw Materials, Packaging and Packaging Materials, Bulk Materials, and Products. Procedure Validation, Equipment Qualification, support in Quality Assurance activities, Stability Studies, among others.
profile_positions.title: Quality Control Analyst
